name: Evac (itch) (Team Hummingbird)
description:
The USS Vermillion. A first class military transport and mining vessel, and symbol of the federation. A space station with secrets. ... a virus. With the entire crew wiped out, one unnamed soldier must fight what were once his allies to his escape.

Team Members:

Thor Bremer

Zach Kolman

Wes Bondie

Edward Mustafaa

Leo Herrera

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Right Click (Hold) - Aim

Left Click (while aiming) - Shoot

E - Use/Pick up

R - Reload (when magazine clip is empty)
